# Product.CollectionTaskState.loading

**Case**

The task is loading the collection in the background.

## Declaration

```swift
case loading
```

## Collection task states

- **Product.CollectionTaskState.success(_:unavailable:)**: The task completed loading the collection.
- **Product.CollectionTaskState.failure(_:)**: The task failed with an error.

items.description: The task completed loading the collection.
